channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No, Gambling Isn’t Ruining Sports
item.description: Having betting out in the open is uncovering the wrongdoing that has likely been going on forever.

item.description: When steel tariffs weaken America’s backbone.

item.description: The progress marks quicker negotiations between the two countries after China’s crackdown on rare-earths exports, expert says.
